a:s.a:s: /* * Library: IMMZD5DTRubellaContraindicationsLogic (IMMZ.D5.DT.Rubella contraindications) * Rule: Check for contraindications before administering the vaccine(s) due * Decision Table: IMMZ.D5.DT.Rubella contraindications * Trigger: IMMZ.D5 Determine vaccine(s) to be administered based on contraindications */ library IMMZD5DTRubellaContraindicationsLogic

def.name: Draft Medication Request ID for Rubella dose

a:t.name: dynamicValue
a:t.value: Draft Medication Request ID for Rubella dose

source.name: Draft Medication Request for Rubella dose

expression.name: The client is receiving blood products
The client has symptomatic HIV infection

a:s.a:s: "The client is exposed to immunosuppressive treatment"

expression.name: The client is exposed to immunosuppressive treatment

a:s.a:s: 'Do not vaccinate client with rubella as rubella vaccination is contraindicated for pregnant client.'
'Do not vaccinate client with rubella as rubella vaccination is contraindicated until at least 3 months after stopping receiving blood products.'
'Do not vaccinate client with rubella as rubella vaccination is contraindicated for clients with symptomatic HIV infection.'
'Do not vaccinate client with rubella as rubella vaccination is contraindicated for clients with active TB.'
'Do not vaccinate client with rubella as rubella vaccination is contraindicated for clients with severe immunodeficiency.'
'Do not vaccinate client with rubella as rubella vaccination is contraindicated for clients receiving or exposed to immunosuppressive therapy.'

then.value: Do not vaccinate client with rubella as rubella vaccination is contraindicated for pregnant client.
Do not vaccinate client with rubella as rubella vaccination is contraindicated until at least 3 months after stopping receiving blood products.
Do not vaccinate client with rubella as rubella vaccination is contraindicated for clients with symptomatic HIV infection.
Do not vaccinate client with rubella as rubella vaccination is contraindicated for clients with active TB.
Do not vaccinate client with rubella as rubella vaccination is contraindicated for clients with severe immunodeficiency.
Do not vaccinate client with rubella as rubella vaccination is contraindicated for clients receiving or exposed to immunosuppressive therapy.

def.name: Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note

a:s.a:s: "The client is planning to get pregnant in next month"

expression.name: The client is planning to get pregnant in next month

def.name: Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note Guidance

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Discuss pregnancy intentions with client, consider risks of vaccination and make a clinical judgement. Clients planning a pregnancy are advised to avoid pregnancy for 1 month after rubella vaccination.

a:s.a:s: 'Discuss pregnancy intentions with client, consider risks of vaccination and make a clinical judgement. Clients planning a pregnancy are advised to avoid pregnancy for 1 month after rubella vaccination.'

expression.value: Discuss pregnancy intentions with client, consider risks of vaccination and make a clinical judgement. Clients planning a pregnancy are advised to avoid pregnancy for 1 month after rubella vaccination.

def.name: Rubella vaccination could be contraindicated. Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note

a:t.value: Rubella vaccination could be contraindicated. Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note

a:s.a:s: "The client has history of severe allergic reactions"

def.name: Rubella vaccination could be contraindicated. Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Rubella vaccination could be contraindicated. Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note Guidance

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Do not vaccinate client with rubella if client has experienced a severe allergic reaction after a previous vaccine dose or vaccine component.

a:s.a:s: 'Do not vaccinate client with rubella if client has experienced a severe allergic reaction after a previous vaccine dose or vaccine component.'

expression.value: Do not vaccinate client with rubella if client has experienced a severe allergic reaction after a previous vaccine dose or vaccine component.
